tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_type VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date_sold DATE
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name STRING,
    property_type STRING,
    price DECIMAL,
    market_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
	property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_name TEXT,
	city TEXT,
	price DECIMAL,
	date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE property_prices (
	price_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_id INT,
	price DECIMAL,
	date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES market_trends(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE property_features (
	feature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_id INT,
	feature_name TEXT,
	value TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES market_trends(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE market_statistics (
	stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	city TEXT,
	average_price DECIMAL,
	total_sales INT,
	date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyPrices (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL,
    last_sold_date DATE
);
